intro:
Gear up for an arcade classic: the crane game!
Win as many prizes as you can and become a crane game master!
description:
Let's enjoy a crane game on the Nintendo Switch™!
Share Joy-Con™ and play with up to 4 players!
Show off your skills with a super play!

[Score Attack]
Get lots of prizes and aim for a top spot on the leaderboards!

[Battle]
Face off against CPUs in single-player mode, or test your skills against friends in multiplayer battles!
Challenge crane game masters from all over the world in online battles!

[Collection]
Step back and admire the prizes you've earned!
There are over 200 different prizes to collect!
